alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 11:53AM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Pennsylvania, including the following county, Crawford. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1147 AM EST, Emergency management has reported that several ice jams have been moving down area creeks. The amount of flooding will continue to vary as the jams experience bends in the creeks before breaking and moving downstream. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - If you live near French Creek or Cussewago Creek be prepared for variable stages along them. Water may rise quickly as ice jams develop. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Meadville, Cambridge Springs, Saegertown and Venango. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
